channel.title: Is the wii worth the money?
channel.description: I am thinking about selling my ps2 and all the stuff and with my other money get a wii, but is it worth it??

item.title: Is the wii worth the money?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

The wii was well worth the money, despite the super-gay name. Unlike the other consoles, it has new innovative controls which is a big plus in my book. Anything for the PS3 or Xbox I can just play on computer better and cheaper.

Read full topic
item.source: Is the wii worth the money?

item.title: Is the wii worth the money?
item.dc:creator: @Daed Daed
item.description:
@Daed wrote:

Ok heres my opinion

The wii

I really loved the wii when it came out, there was nothing like it. Its a really fun console with your friends and family, it just seemed so amazing the way you played with it, looked a bit poor for me with my shakey hands on some shooting games :o but they were fun just the same, if your looking for something great, cheap (meh, i had to save up for ages to get it but you guys say its cheap :P) and some new fun gameplay, the wii is the way to go.

The 360

I really loved the 360 when i got it to, but the thing that i prefer about the 360 to the wii is Xbox live, i find it really fun as all my friends at my school have it and even my friends from my old primary school that went other ways have it and its a good way to stay in touch imo, because i’m used to playing the pc and not console gaming, i am always online, so thats the thing i love so much about the 360, if online play is your thing i would get it.

The PS3

I’ve never played this one, but everyone that has it says its good, and say its better than the xbox, and everyone with a xbox 360 says the PS3 is crap at my school, i think there both kind of the same graphics wise, but as Xbox360 onlne play costs monthly i believe its better, sorry if anything i have said is wrong its just what i imagine is the case from what i’ve heard ;D

Read full topic
item.source: Is the wii worth the money?

item.title: Is the wii worth the money?
item.dc:creator: @rspoon rspoon
item.description:
@rspoon wrote:

I myself dont have a Wii, but I normally play with friends who have a wii.

The graphics arent the best, but the gameplay is much better than what you will get from a 360 or PS3.

Whether you’re playing Madden 08, Mario Party 8, or Tiger Woods, you will have a great time doing it :).
Plus, I think it was a good idea to finally make a game system where people needed to move around. As it is, not many people get out to exercise anymore.

Read full topic
item.source: Is the wii worth the money?

item.title: Is the wii worth the money?
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

[quote=“Monster Hack, post:12, topic:152053”]You can’t compare two totally different “concepts” of console ffs…
Wii vs 360? No. Wii is meant to be for anyone. The games don’t worry about realism, they worry about game play and controls, which are things that games these days seem to lack very much.
Everyone boasts about the 360’s and PS3’s GFX, but someone who actually likes video games shouldn’t care. 8 bit, 128 bit or whatever, it doesn’t matter. Games never started out looking super realistic, why put all our efforts into it now?

The Wii is great by yourself and even better at parties. The games coming out soon are going to be wicked. Brawl and Galaxies are some to be looking at. Also, Twilight Princess? That was such a good game.

Another thing to look at with the Wii is the virtual console…Oh man those games take me back to when I got my NES. They’re cheap, quick to download and exactly the same as they were before.

Don’t really know what to say besides the Wii is an amazing system. It’s cheap, it’s fun and it’s a step in the right direction.

-Mh[/quote]
i’d have to agree with it, i play games for their gameplay, not for their uber-detailed realistic graphics.
and yeah, it’s impossible to compare wii to x360.

Read full topic
item.source: Is the wii worth the money?

item.title: Is the wii worth the money?
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:17, topic:152053”][quote author=Zach1188 link=topic=207994.msg1830351#msg1830351 date=1192769054]
However by instinct, humans are drawn to entertainment more closely related to their own reality.
[/quote]

Why exactly is WoW so appealing then?[/quote]

I dont know, i use to play WoW alot around christmas when i got it, I played it all threw january, and me and my friend would stay up form 8 at night to 8 in the morning playing it. I think it is just addicting, adn thats why people play it. I find Guild wars to be about the same, and Planeshift to be a little better ( because its free :P)

Read full topic

item.title: Is the wii worth the money?
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

Wii is funner in a cartoonish sort of way.
PS3 however, is funner in a more realistic sort of way.

At first, it depends on the individuals opinion. However by instinct, humans are drawn to entertainment more closely related to their own reality. Therefore, you will get bored of the Wii much faster. The PS3 will have a more long term appeal.

Read full topic
item.source: Is the wii worth the money?
